mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oto(oto_num, oto_subject, oto_content, oto_date, oto_category, oto_reply_status, theater_num, member_id, oto_file1, oto_file2 ) VALUES (null, #{oto.oto_subject}, #{oto.oto_content}, now(), #{oto.oto_category}, '미답', #{theater_num}, #{id}, #{oto_file1}, #{oto_file2} )
mapper.select: SELECT o.oto_num, o.oto_subject, o.oto_content, o.oto_date, o.oto_category, o.oto_reply_status, o.theater_num, o.member_id, t.theater_name FROM oto o JOIN theater t on o.theater_num = t.theater_num WHERE oto_num = #{oto_num}
